resources.string: Take a look at \"Show WiFi Password\"
If you think this app is useful, would you mind taking a moment to rate it? It won\'t take more than a minute. Thanks for your support!

If the Root permissions dined, Please revoke as this app needs Root Permissions to read your WiFi Password If your device is not Rooted and you wish to Root Try searching google for How to Root <Your Phone Model>
Trying to Root without proper Knowledge can finish with bricking your device. So make sure you know what you are doing before trying to Root your device
